alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield County through 430 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bethel, or near Newtown, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danbury, Newtown, Bethel, Brookfield, New Fairfield and Redding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
